initial:
A dropdown is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.dropdown(id, icon, caption, options, style='w3-bar-item w3-xlarge', title='')
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the dropdown
iconDropdown icon (Font Awesome)
captionDropdown text
optionsOptions list
clientClient listening to dropdown
methodMethod of the client listening to selection of options
addIDIndicates if the id of the selected option that is sent to the client includes the dropdown id or not
styleDropdown style (w3css)
titleTooltip
